page.title: 05Mr. Morgan -The Shepherd.
page.content: An average sheep lives up to 5 or 6 years. The oldest sheep is 6 years old. Mr. Morgan said that if you had 1 sheep for a pet and feed it well every day, it would live for about 15 years. But at the farm they cannot afford to keep every sheep as a pet!! They sell the sheep,lamb and rams, but sometimes they get stolen.Mr. Morgan said there was no way of telling 1 sheep from another, but he just got used to them because they are just like humans; they have their little diffrences. If different breeds of sheep are put together ,they sometimes have problems with breeding. Mr. Morgan has 5 sheep dogs and he trains most of them himself.Female sheep dogs are easier to train than males.
